title: In high rise and special buildings, access to main staircases shall be gained through atleast half-an-hour fire-resisting automatic closing doors, placed in the enclosing walls of the staircases
clause_text: In high rise and special buildings, access to main staircases shall be gained through atleast half-an-hour fire-resisting automatic closing doors, placed in the enclosing walls of the staircases. They shall be swing type doors opening in the direction of the escape. No living space, store or other space, involving fire risk, shall open directly into a staircase.
